01.speaker: Narrator
01.text: With the village’s fate hanging in the balance, Ọmọtẹmi sets out to find proof of the Orisha’s power. The road forks ahead—one path leading toward the storm-cloaked temple of Ṣàngó, the other toward the hidden waters of Yemoja’s shrine.
01.scene_description: A dusty road winds ahead, splitting into two paths. Dark clouds swirl above one route, while the other disappears beneath a shimmering blue mist.

options.text: Mo máa kó sílé Ṣàngó. Ògún la ti máa fi yan àkànṣe.
options.translation: I will go to Ṣàngó. Strength must carve the path forward.

options.text: Mo máa lo sí Yemoja. Òye ati ìbùkún ni mo fẹ.
options.translation: I will go to Yemoja. Wisdom and blessing are what I seek.

options.text: Jẹ́ kí n wá ojútùú. Ṣé a lè yà lórí, tàbí a le jo lọ?
options.translation: Let me find another way. Can I split my path, or can we go together?

split_decision.speaker: Narrator
split_decision.text: Splitting paths means taking longer, but it may grant a deeper understanding of both Orisha. However, the village grows more restless with every passing moment.
split_decision.scene_description: Time is slipping away. If Ọmọtẹmi delays, the village may lose faith.

options.text: Ṣàngó kò ní dúró. Mo máa kó sí ibẹ̀ nísisìyí!
options.translation: Ṣàngó will not wait. I must go there now!

options.text: Yemoja ni òtítọ́ wa. Mo máa wá àsìkò sí Yemoja.
options.translation: Yemoja is our truth. I will take time for Yemoja.
